Bethlehem.Nancy Run: Nancy Run (also known as Nancys Run) is a tributary of the Lehigh River in Northampton County, Pennsylvania, in the United States. It is approximately 4.1 miles (6.6 km) long and flows through Bethlehem Township and Freemansburg. The watershed of the stream has an area of approximately 6.14 square miles (15.9 km2).
